verses.name: 2 Kings 16:11
verses.text: And Urijah the priest built an altar according to all that king Ahaz had sent from Damascus: so Urijah the priest made it against king Ahaz came from Damascus.

verses.name: 2 Kings 16:12
verses.text: And when the king was come from Damascus, the king saw the altar: and the king approached to the altar, and offered thereon.

verses.name: 2 Kings 16:13
verses.text: And he burnt his burnt offering and his meat offering, and poured his drink offering, and sprinkled the blood of his peace offerings, upon the altar.
